Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER across all process variants where it occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Total time spent in Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER compared to total time spent in Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION within the same cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that include both activities
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that proceed to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR occurs

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in cases that later experience a rejection (e.g., by SUPERVISOR or MISSING)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR occurs

Name: Average time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that complete the full process (ending in Payment Handled)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER is performed after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time from Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Request Payment in successful end-to-end variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time for Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER compared to average time for Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER in parallel approval paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time between Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER and any subsequent rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that involve re-submissions due to prior rejections
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time it takes Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to be completed after the employee resubmits following a rejection by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
